Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a clutch home run in the eighth inning to secure a 3-2 win for the Yankees.
Stanton's standout performance included three hits and a stolen base.
Luke Weaver navigated a bases-loaded situation in the bottom of the eighth inning to secure the save.
The game marked the first postseason contest at Kauffman Stadium in over 3,000 days.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Royals legend Eric Hosmer threw out the ceremonial first pitch.
